The Badger Rock neighborhood is located on the South side of Madison, with easy access to the Downtown, East side, West side, and I-90. Badger Rock, named after Badger Road and Rimrock Road, is primarily a neighborhood of single family homes with condos and apartments in the area as well.

![](images/LabeledMap.png){fig-align="center"}

Badger Rock has close proximity to the Nine Springs E-Way system, along with Capital Springs State Park, the Capital City State Trail, and numerous parks allows residents to enjoy both the urban and natural settings of the city.

As a neighborhood, we seek to create a sustainable, thriving home for our residents via community engagement. Together, we can maintain and improve the quality of life for all of the residents of the neighborhood.
